headline: LKQ Initiates Strategic Review to Maximize Shareholder Value
summary: ANTIOCH, Tenn., Jan. 26, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LKQ Corporation (Nasdaq: LKQ) (“LKQ” or “the Company”) today announced that its Board of Directors has initiated a comprehensive review of strategic alternatives to enhance shareholder value. As part of the review, the Board is working with its advisors to evaluate the Company’s strategic alternatives, including a potential sale of the Company. “The Board and management continually evaluate the Company’s performance and strategic positioning as p
